thread.title: CHRIS
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by CHRIS

author: CHRIS
title: CHRIS
text: Made a booking with Europcar for my arrival at the Gold oast, then when picking up the car Europcar would only take credit card, no flexibility, not good enough. The Friendly staff at Redspot were quick to help, got me a better car and saved me money and I could pay cash for the car . Will use them again
